safetyTips: Social distance deliveries, masks, gloves and hand sanitiser at all times.
name: REFILLDROP
description: Zero-waste shopping! Everything we sell comes in reusable packaging that we collect, clean and reuse. Currently sell toiletries, hand sanitiser, cleaning supplies etc. Everything is eco-friendly, biodegradable and with no single-use plastic packaging ever. 10% off and free delivery for members. Order via our website.
